title: orders management bulk import validation
description: Verify that the Orders Management API correctly handles bulk import of new part requests, including validation for duplicates and attachment support.

title: main sheet part lifecycle auto move
description: Test the Main Sheet API to ensure parts automatically move through lifecycle statuses (Pending → Arrived → Available → Call List) with correct visual indicators.

title: booking system multi customer vin grouping
description: Validate the Booking System API supports scheduling appointments with multi-customer VIN grouping and maintains booking history accurately.

title: call list customer communication logging
description: Check the Call List API for proper tracking of call statuses and logging of customer communications.

title: archive history retention and compliance
description: Ensure the Archive API retains historical data for 48 hours with documented archived reasons for compliance and immutable records.

title: api endpoint trigger backup workflow
description: Test the API endpoint that triggers the GitHub Actions workflow to backup reports, verifying successful initiation and response handling.

title: data grid sorting filtering virtualization
description: Validate the Data Grid API supports advanced sorting, filtering, and virtualization features for efficient data handling.

title: search functionality cross tab accuracy
description: Test the Search API to ensure accurate cross-tab search results across VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, and Company fields.
